document.full_text: a 3-year-old boy freed himself from a safety harness. stood up and fell to his death from a roller coaster he was riding with his family at a chicago suburban amusement park, authorities confirmed on sunday.
document.title: three-year-old boy falls to his death from rollercoaster
lines_and_colors: a 3-year-old boy freed himself from a safety harness. stood up and fell to his death from a roller coaster he was riding with his family at a chicago suburban amusement park, authorities confirmed on sunday.
